content:
this is a single endpoint from an open api spec document
it has been minified by removing unnecessary kvps
additionally common terms have been abbreviated  operationId: GetDiscoveryProviderDetails path: https://gateway.stackpath.com/dns/v1/discovery/{domain}/provider_details content: params
name domain
desc a hostname to scan for provider information
in path
required true
schema
type str
sum get provider details
desc scan a domain for dns provider information
responses
200
zonegetdiscoveryproviderdetailsresponse
type obj
props
zonednsprovider
type str
default general
desc the types of dns providers that stackpath can detect

dns provider types can trigger different logic when stackpath scans a domain
requiresauthentication
type bool
format bool
desc whether or not the provider requires authentication to scan or modify the domain
nameservers
type str
desc the domains authoritative nameservers
desc a response from a request to scan a domain name for information about its provider
title: 24_Scanning_GetDiscoveryProviderDetails_145.json
